Takumi Minamino is happy at Liverpool and is working with "good guys".
That's according to his former boss at Salzburg Jesse Marsch, who has remained in contact with the Japan international via text… [+2194 chars]

articles.description: The Everton squad are back at USM Finch Farm... but training hasn't returned to normal just yet. Ahead of the Premier League's approval to move to Phase Two ...
